lyrics:
Turn the lights down baby
And come to me baby
Let me put something on your mind hmm...
See I've gotta let you know
That I want, where I want, whenever I need it baby
So you know you better be ready tonight
'Cause its on
(Haven't you heard about the up and down and round and round)
Haven't you heard baby
You should've known by now baby
(You should've known by now about the merry-go-round)
Up and down and round and round ohhh
(Baby, haven't you heard about my up and down and round and round)
You should've known by now
(You should've known by now about the merry-go round)
You said you'd be happy
With your wife and happy home
Well, what I don't understand is why your here with me tonight
'Cause if your girlfriend would do the freaky things I do to you
Then you do have the time to hang around for my up and down
Deep in my heart
I know I can make you moan
Come on and let's get it on baby
And all in my mind
I wanna hold on tight
'Cause tonight is the night
We won't stop 'till we get it all right
Hold on tight tonight is the night
Baby you're in for the time of your life yeah...
(Haven't you heard about my up and down and round and round)
Haven't you heard baby
(You should've known by now about the merry-go-round)
You should've known by now my baby
(Baby, haven't you heard about my up and down and round and round)
Round and round and round we go
Baby we won't stop nobody ever know ohhh
(You should've known by now about the merry-go round)
Up and down baby
(Haven't you heard about my up and down and round and round)
